tool.name: OTB.GridBasedImageResampling
tool.description: Resamples an image according to a resampling grid
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayio.in False isArraygrid.in False output_data_io.out $output_data_io.out name OTB.GridBasedImageResampling io.in $io.in io.out $io.out grid.in $grid.in grid.type $grid.type out.ulx $out.ulx out.uly $out.uly out.sizex $out.sizex out.sizey $out.sizey out.spacingx $out.spacingx out.spacingy $out.spacingy out.default $out.default interpolator $interpolator interpolator.bco.radius $interpolator.bco.radius prefer $prefer response $response outputType_io.out $OutputSection_io.out.outputType_io.out transmissionMode_io.out $OutputSection_io.out.transmissionMode_io.out

param.name: io.in
param.label: The input image to resample
param.help: The input image to resample The following data types are allowed in the txt file: png, tiff, jpeg

param.name: grid.in
param.label: The resampling grid
param.help: The resampling grid The following data types are allowed in the txt file: png, tiff, jpeg

param.name: grid.type
param.label: allows one to choose between two grid types
param.help: allows one to choose between two grid types

param.name: out.ulx
param.label: X Coordinate of the upper-left pixel of the output resampled image
param.help: X Coordinate of the upper-left pixel of the output resampled image

param.name: out.uly
param.label: Y Coordinate of the upper-left pixel of the output resampled image
param.help: Y Coordinate of the upper-left pixel of the output resampled image

param.name: out.sizex
param.label: Size of the output resampled image along X (in pixels)
param.help: Size of the output resampled image along X (in pixels)

param.name: out.sizey
param.label: Size of the output resampled image along Y (in pixels)
param.help: Size of the output resampled image along Y (in pixels)

param.name: out.spacingx
param.label: Size of each pixel along X axis
param.help: Size of each pixel along X axis

param.name: out.spacingy
param.label: Size of each pixel along Y axis
param.help: Size of each pixel along Y axis

param.name: out.default
param.label: The default value to give to pixel that falls outside of the input image.
param.help: The default value to give to pixel that falls outside of the input image.

param.name: interpolator
param.label: This group of parameters allows one to define how the input image will be interpolated during resampling.
param.help: This group of parameters allows one to define how the input image will be interpolated during resampling.

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_io.out
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_io.out
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: This application allows performing image resampling from an input resampling grid.
